name: Joaquín Araya
bio: Joaquín Araya, a dynamic 20-year-old from Costa Rica, is known for his agile dribbling and precise left-footed passes. With a passion for the game that ignites the field, he embodies the tactical intelligence of Tierra Alta FC, often orchestrating plays with vision and flair. His electrifying presence is complemented by a tenacity that makes him a fan favorite.
